Leave Application Policy

1. Introduction

This document outlines the leave application policy for all employees. Adherence to this policy is mandatory.

2. Types of Leave

Our company provides the following types of leave:

  • Annual Leave: Employees are entitled to 20 days of annual leave.
  • Sick Leave: Employees are entitled to 10 days of sick leave per year.
  • Casual Leave: Employees can avail up to 7 days of casual leave.

3. Application Process

The leave application process is as follows:

  • Submit a leave application form at least 5 days in advance.
  • Ensure that your leave does not clash with critical project timelines.
  • Obtain approval from your immediate supervisor.

4. Leave Approval

All leave requests are subject to approval based on business requirements and staffing levels.

5. Contact Information

If you have any questions regarding the leave policy, please contact the HR department at hr@company.com.

Thank you for your cooperation.
